channel.title: SMF 74 Subtype 7 on IBM SMF Explorer
channel.description: Recent content in SMF 74 Subtype 7 on IBM SMF Explorer

item.title: Field - _7cl
item.description: Length of connector section Record: SMF74S7 Based on: SMF747CL

item.title: Field - _7cn
item.description: Number of connector sections Record: SMF74S7 Based on: SMF747CN

item.title: Field - _7co
item.description: Offset to connector section Record: SMF74S7 Based on: SMF747CO

item.title: Field - _7gl
item.description: Length of global data section Record: SMF74S7 Based on: SMF747GL

item.title: Field - _7gn
item.description: Number of global data sections Record: SMF74S7 Based on: SMF747GN

item.title: Field - _7go
item.description: Offset to global data section Record: SMF74S7 Based on: SMF747GO

item.title: Field - _7pl
item.description: Length of port data section Record: SMF74S7 Based on: SMF747PL

item.title: Field - _7pn
item.description: Number of port data sections Record: SMF74S7 Based on: SMF747PN

item.title: Field - _7po
item.description: Offset to port data section Record: SMF74S7 Based on: SMF747PO

item.title: Field - _7sl
item.description: Length of switch data section Record: SMF74S7 Based on: SMF747SL

item.title: Field - _7sn
item.description: Number of switch data sections Record: SMF74S7 Based on: SMF747SN

item.title: Field - _7so
item.description: Offset to switch data section Record: SMF74S7 Based on: SMF747SO

item.title: Field - bfy
item.description: SYSTEM RUNNING IN PR/SM MODE Record: SMF74S7 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field flg.

item.title: Field - boost_class
item.description: Boost class: 001 IPL, 010 Shutdown, 011 Recovery Process, Default: Unknown Map: SMF74PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed Flags postprocessor for multiple bit mapping.

item.title: Field - cne
item.description: Equipped with ESCON channel Map: SMF74PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field prf.

item.title: Field - cnv
item.description: Data converted from version 2 Map: SMF74PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field fla.

item.title: Field - cyc
item.description: Sampling cycle length 000TTTTF Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74CYC

item.title: Field - dat
item.description: Date monitor interval start: 00YYDDDF Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74DAT

item.title: Field - date
item.description: Date of Record Record: SMF74S7 Based on: SMF74DTE

item.title: Field - drc
item.description: ESCON Director in configuration Map: SMF74PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field prf.

item.title: Field - dte
item.description: DATE RECORD WRITTEN Record: SMF74S7 Based on: SMF74DTE

item.title: Field - eed
item.description: Speed boost was active during entire interval Map: SMF74PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 10 of field fla.

item.title: Field - eme
item.description: System in z/ARCH mode Map: SMF74PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field prf.

item.title: Field - esa
item.description: MVS/ESA IF ON Record: SMF74S7 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field flg.

item.title: Field - fla
item.description: Flags Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74FLA Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description cnv 0 Data converted from version 2 iss 1 Invalid samples to be skipped m3r 2 Record was written by RMF Monitor III ism 3 Interval was under SMF control rcl 4 SMF record converted to lower service level. rch 5 SMF record converted to higher release or service level.

item.title: Field - flg
item.description: SYSTEM INDICATOR FLAGS Record: SMF74S7 Based on: SMF74FLG Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description rrf 0 NEW RECORD FORMAT sut 1 SUBTYPES USED v4 3 MVS/ESA V4 IF ON esa 4 MVS/ESA IF ON vxa 5 MVS/XA IF ON os 6 OPERATING SYSTEM IS OS/VS2 bfy 7 SYSTEM RUNNING IN PR/SM MODE

item.title: Field - gie
item.description: Projected gathering interval end GMT time (STCK format) Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74GIE

item.title: Field - iet
item.description: Interval expiration time token Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74IET

item.title: Field - iip
item.description: zIIP boost was active during entire interval Map: SMF74PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 9 of field fla.

item.title: Field - iml
item.description: Indicates the type of processor complex on which data measurements were taken. Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74IML Description X'03’ = 9672, zSeries

item.title: Field - int
item.description: Duration of monitor interval: MMSSTTTF Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74INT

item.title: Field - ism
item.description: Interval was under SMF control Map: SMF74PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field fla.

item.title: Field - iss
item.description: Invalid samples to be skipped Map: SMF74PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field fla.

item.title: Field - ist
item.description: TOD monitor interval start: 0HHMMSSF Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74IST

item.title: Field - len
item.description: SMF RECORD LENGTH. Record: SMF74S7 Based on: SMF74LEN Description ZERO AFTER GRBSMFR REASSEMBLY

item.title: Field - lgo
item.description: Offset GMT to local time Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74LGO

item.title: Field - m3r
item.description: Record was written by RMF Monitor III Map: SMF74PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field fla.

item.title: Field - mfv
item.description: RMF version number in packed decimal format: nnnF Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74MFV

item.title: Field - mvs
item.description: MVS software level (consists of an acronym and the version, release, and modification level - ZVvvrrmm) Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74MVS

item.title: Field - oil
item.description: Original interval length as defined in the session or by SMF (in seconds) Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74OIL

item.title: Field - os
item.description: OPERATING SYSTEM IS OS/VS2 Record: SMF74S7 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field flg.

item.title: Field - pe2
item.description: Enhanced DAT facility 2 Map: SMF74PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field prf.

item.title: Field - ped
item.description: Enhanced DAT facility 1 Map: SMF74PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field prf.

item.title: Field - prd
item.description: Product name Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74PRD

item.title: Field - prf
item.description: Processor flags Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74PRF Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description qes 0 System has expanded storage cne 1 Equipped with ESCON channel drc 2 ESCON Director in configuration eme 3 System in z/ARCH mode pri 4 At least one zAAP is currently installed prp 5 At least one zIIP is currently installed ped 6 Enhanced DAT facility 1 pe2 7 Enhanced DAT facility 2

item.title: Field - pri
item.description: At least one zAAP is currently installed Map: SMF74PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field prf.

item.title: Field - prl
item.description: LENGTH OF RMF PRODUCT SECTION Record: SMF74S7 Based on: SMF74PRL

item.title: Field - prn
item.description: NUMBER OF RMF PRODUCT SECTIONS Record: SMF74S7 Based on: SMF74PRN

item.title: Field - prp
item.description: At least one zIIP is currently installed Map: SMF74PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field prf.

item.title: Field - prs
item.description: OFFSET TO RMF PRODUCT SECTION Record: SMF74S7 Based on: SMF74PRS

item.title: Field - ptn
item.description: PR/SM partition number Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74PTN

item.title: Field - qes
item.description: System has expanded storage Map: SMF74PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field prf.

item.title: Field - r747cact
item.description: Port has been activated Map: R747CDAT Based on: r747csfl Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field r747csfl.

item.title: Field - r747cadr
item.description: Port address Map: R747CDAT Based on: R747CADR

item.title: Field - r747cchp
item.description: Port type is CHPID Map: R747CDAT Based on: r747ctfl Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field r747ctfl.

item.title: Field - r747ccp
item.description: Connector id (channel path) Map: R747CDAT Based on: R747CCP

item.title: Field - r747ccu
item.description: Connector id (CU) Map: R747CDAT Based on: R747CCU

item.title: Field - r747ccun
item.description: Number of connector CUs Map: R747CDAT Based on: R747CCUN

item.title: Field - r747cins
item.description: 1=, port installed Map: R747CDAT Based on: r747csfl Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field r747csfl.

item.title: Field - r747cinu
item.description: Id is not unique or not known Map: R747CDAT Based on: r747csfl Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field r747csfl.

item.title: Field - r747cmcu
item.description: Port type is multiple CU Map: R747CDAT Based on: r747ctfl Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field r747ctfl.

item.title: Field - r747cnmd
item.description: This entry doesn’t contain measurement data Map: R747CDAT Based on: r747csfl Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field r747csfl.

item.title: Field - r747cnum
item.description: Port number Map: R747CDAT Based on: R747CNUM

item.title: Field - r747cosy
item.description: 1=, channel on caller’s system Map: R747CDAT Based on: r747csfl Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field r747csfl.

item.title: Field - r747crem
item.description: Port has been removed Map: R747CDAT Based on: r747csfl Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field r747csfl.

item.title: Field - r747cscu
item.description: Port type is single CU Map: R747CDAT Based on: r747ctfl Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field r747ctfl.

item.title: Field - r747csfl
item.description: Status flags Map: R747CDAT Based on: R747CSFL Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description r747ctnu 0 Port type is not unique r747cinu 1 Id is not unique or not known r747cosy 2 1=, channel on caller’s system r747cins 3 1=, port installed r747cvar 4 Port status changed r747crem 5 Port has been removed r747cact 6 Port has been activated r747cnmd 7 This entry doesn’t contain measurement data

item.title: Field - r747csw
item.description: Port type is switch Map: R747CDAT Based on: r747ctfl Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field r747ctfl.

item.title: Field - r747ctfl
item.description: Port type flags Map: R747CDAT Based on: R747CTFL Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description r747cscu 0 Port type is single CU r747cmcu 1 Port type is multiple CU r747cchp 2 Port type is CHPID r747csw 3 Port type is switch

item.title: Field - r747ctnu
item.description: Port type is not unique Map: R747CDAT Based on: r747csfl Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field r747csfl.

item.title: Field - r747cvar
item.description: Port status changed Map: R747CDAT Based on: r747csfl Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field r747csfl.

item.title: Field - r747gcfl
item.description: Configuration change flags Map: R747GDAT Based on: R747GCFL Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description r747gdca 0 =1, Configuration changed during interval r747giac 1 =1, Configuration changed since IPL r747giod 2 =1, System IPLed via IODF r747gicv 3 =1, I/O configuration token is valid

item.title: Field - r747gdca
item.description: =1, Configuration changed during interval Map: R747GDAT Based on: r747gcfl Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field r747gcfl.

item.title: Field - r747giac
item.description: =1, Configuration changed since IPL Map: R747GDAT Based on: r747gcfl Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field r747gcfl.

item.title: Field - r747gicd
item.description: IODF creation date mm/dd/yyyy Map: R747GDAT Based on: R747GICD

item.title: Field - r747gict
item.description: IODF creation time hh.mm.ss Map: R747GDAT Based on: R747GICT

item.title: Field - r747gicv
item.description: =1, I/O configuration token is valid Map: R747GDAT Based on: r747gcfl Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field r747gcfl.

item.title: Field - r747ginm
item.description: IODF name Map: R747GDAT Based on: R747GINM

item.title: Field - r747giod
item.description: =1, System IPLed via IODF Map: R747GDAT Based on: r747gcfl Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field r747gcfl.

item.title: Field - r747gisf
item.description: Suffix of IODF name Map: R747GDAT Based on: R747GISF

item.title: Field - r747gnfd
item.description: Number of installed FCD switches Map: R747GDAT Based on: R747GNFD

item.title: Field - r747pact
item.description: Port has been activated Map: R747PDAT Based on: r747psfl Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field r747psfl.

item.title: Field - r747padr
item.description: Port address Map: R747PDAT Based on: R747PADR

item.title: Field - r747pand
item.description: Node descriptor of attached unit Map: R747PDAT Based on: R747PAND

item.title: Field - r747pchp
item.description: Port type is CHPID Map: R747PDAT Based on: r747ptfl Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field r747ptfl.

item.title: Field - r747pcp
item.description: Connector id (channel path) Map: R747PDAT Based on: R747PCP

item.title: Field - r747pcu
item.description: Connector id (CU) Map: R747PDAT Based on: R747PCU

item.title: Field - r747pcun
item.description: Number of connector CUs Map: R747PDAT Based on: R747PCUN

item.title: Field - r747pfpt
item.description: Frame pacing time in units of 2.5 micro-seconds (long floating point) Map: R747PDAT Based on: R747PFPT

item.title: Field - r747pins
item.description: 1=, port installed Map: R747PDAT Based on: r747psfl Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field r747psfl.

item.title: Field - r747pinu
item.description: Id is not unique or not known Map: R747PDAT Based on: r747psfl Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field r747psfl.

item.title: Field - r747plf
item.description: Port information showed link failure condition Map: R747PDAT Based on: r747ppfl Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field r747ppfl.

item.title: Field - r747pmcu
item.description: Port type is multiple CU Map: R747PDAT Based on: r747ptfl Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field r747ptfl.

item.title: Field - r747pner
item.description: Number of errors (long floating point) Map: R747PDAT Based on: R747PNER

item.title: Field - r747pnfr
item.description: Number of frames received (long floating point) Map: R747PDAT Based on: R747PNFR

item.title: Field - r747pnft
item.description: Number of frames transmitted (long floating point) Map: R747PDAT Based on: R747PNFT

item.title: Field - r747pnmd
item.description: This entry doesn’t contain measurement data Map: R747PDAT Based on: r747psfl Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field r747psfl.

item.title: Field - r747pnpc
item.description: Number of connector sections Map: R747PDAT Based on: R747PNPC

item.title: Field - r747pnti
item.description: Port information showed this port not installed Map: R747PDAT Based on: r747ppfl Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field r747ppfl.

item.title: Field - r747pnum
item.description: Port number Map: R747PDAT Based on: R747PNUM

item.title: Field - r747pnwr
item.description: Number of words received (long floating point) Map: R747PDAT Based on: R747PNWR

item.title: Field - r747pnwt
item.description: Number of words transmitted (long floating point) Map: R747PDAT Based on: R747PNWT

item.title: Field - r747poff
item.description: Port information showed this port offline Map: R747PDAT Based on: r747ppfl Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field r747ppfl.

item.title: Field - r747posy
item.description: 1=, channel on caller’s system Map: R747PDAT Based on: r747psfl Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field r747psfl.

item.title: Field - r747ppfl
item.description: Port flags Map: R747PDAT Based on: R747PPFL Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description r747ppir 0 Port information was returned at least once for this port r747pnti 1 Port information showed this port not installed r747plf 2 Port information showed link failure condition r747poff 3 Port information showed this port offline r747pscr 4 Statistics were returned at least once for this port

item.title: Field - r747ppir
item.description: Port information was returned at least once for this port Map: R747PDAT Based on: r747ppfl Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field r747ppfl.

item.title: Field - r747prem
item.description: Port has been removed Map: R747PDAT Based on: r747psfl Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field r747psfl.

item.title: Field - r747pscr
item.description: Statistics were returned at least once for this port Map: R747PDAT Based on: r747ppfl Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field r747ppfl.

item.title: Field - r747pscu
item.description: Port type is single CU Map: R747PDAT Based on: r747ptfl Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field r747ptfl.

item.title: Field - r747psfl
item.description: Status flags Map: R747PDAT Based on: R747PSFL Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description r747ptnu 0 Port type is not unique r747pinu 1 Id is not unique or not known r747posy 2 1=, channel on caller’s system r747pins 3 1=, port installed r747pvar 4 Port status changed r747prem 5 Port has been removed r747pact 6 Port has been activated r747pnmd 7 This entry doesn’t contain measurement data

item.title: Field - r747psw
item.description: Port type is switch Map: R747PDAT Based on: r747ptfl Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field r747ptfl.

item.title: Field - r747ptfl
item.description: Port type flags Map: R747PDAT Based on: R747PTFL Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description r747pscu 0 Port type is single CU r747pmcu 1 Port type is multiple CU r747pchp 2 Port type is CHPID r747psw 3 Port type is switch

item.title: Field - r747ptnu
item.description: Port type is not unique Map: R747PDAT Based on: r747psfl Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field r747psfl.

item.title: Field - r747pvar
item.description: Port status changed Map: R747PDAT Based on: r747psfl Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field r747psfl.

item.title: Field - r747pxpc
item.description: Index of first connector section Map: R747PDAT Based on: R747PXPC

item.title: Field - r747sdev
item.description: Switch device number Map: R747SDAT Based on: R747SDEV

item.title: Field - r747sfcs
item.description: =1, cascaded switch Map: R747SDAT Based on: r747spfl Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field r747spfl.

item.title: Field - r747slsn
item.description: Logical switch number Map: R747SDAT Based on: R747SLSN

item.title: Field - r747snd
item.description: ND associated with switch device Map: R747SDAT Based on: R747SND

item.title: Field - r747snip
item.description: Number of installed ports for this switch Map: R747SDAT Based on: R747SNIP

item.title: Field - r747snol
item.description: =1, switch is now online Map: R747SDAT Based on: r747spfl Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field r747spfl.

item.title: Field - r747snpc
item.description: =1, number of ports has changed Map: R747SDAT Based on: r747spfl Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field r747spfl.

item.title: Field - r747snsp
item.description: Number of supported ports for this switch Map: R747SDAT Based on: R747SNSP

item.title: Field - r747soff
item.description: =1, switch is offline Map: R747SDAT Based on: r747spfl Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field r747spfl.

item.title: Field - r747spfl
item.description: Switch processing flags Map: R747SDAT Based on: R747SPFL Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description r747svar 0 =1, status of switch has changed r747snpc 1 =1, number of ports has changed r747soff 2 =1, switch is offline r747snol 3 =1, switch is now online r747sfcs 4 =1, cascaded switch

item.title: Field - r747svar
item.description: =1, status of switch has changed Map: R747SDAT Based on: r747spfl Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field r747spfl.

item.title: Field - ral
item.description: Length of reassembly area. Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74RAL Description Area consists of a fixed header and a variable number of information blocks. Length depends on the record type/subtype, but is fixed for a specific type/subtype

item.title: Field - ran
item.description: Number of reassembly area. Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74RAN Description This field is used to indicate whether SMF record is broken. If 0, record is not broken. If 1, record is broken. Offset and length are only valid if SMFxxRAN is 1. Reassembly area is only present in broken records.

item.title: Field - rao
item.description: Offset to reassembly area relative to start of RMF product section Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74RAO

item.title: Field - rch
item.description: SMF record converted to higher release or service level. Map: SMF74PRO Based on: fla Description Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR. Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field fla.

item.title: Field - rcl
item.description: SMF record converted to lower service level. Map: SMF74PRO Based on: fla Description Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR. Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field fla.

item.title: Field - rrf
item.description: NEW RECORD FORMAT Record: SMF74S7 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field flg.

item.title: Field - rty
item.description: RECORD TYPE Record: SMF74S7 Based on: SMF74RTY

item.title: Field - sam
item.description: Number of samples Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74SAM

item.title: Field - seg
item.description: SEGMENT DESCRIPTOR Record: SMF74S7 Based on: SMF74SEG

item.title: Field - sid
item.description: SYSTEM ID FROM INSTALLATION Record: SMF74S7 Based on: SMF74SID

item.title: Field - snm
item.description: System name for current system as defined in CVTSNAME Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74SNM

item.title: Field - srl
item.description: SMF record level Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74SRL

item.title: Field - ssi
item.description: SUBSYSTEM ID (RMF ) Record: SMF74S7 Based on: SMF74SSI

item.title: Field - sty
item.description: SUBTYPE Record: SMF74S7 Based on: SMF74STY

item.title: Field - sut
item.description: SUBTYPES USED Record: SMF74S7 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field flg.

item.title: Field - syn
item.description: SYNC value in seconds Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74SYN

item.title: Field - time
item.description: Time of Record Record: SMF74S7 Based on: SMF74TME

item.title: Field - timestamp
item.description: Record Timestamp Record: SMF74S7 Based on: date, time Description Timestamp from SMF data Post-Processed This field is combined from a date and a time field to form a timestamp.

item.title: Field - tme
item.description: TOD RECORD WRITTEN Record: SMF74S7 Based on: SMF74TME

item.title: Field - trn
item.description: NUMBER OF TRIPLETS IN THIS REC Record: SMF74S7 Based on: SMF74TRN

item.title: Field - v4
item.description: MVS/ESA V4 IF ON Record: SMF74S7 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field flg.

item.title: Field - vxa
item.description: MVS/XA IF ON Record: SMF74S7 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field flg.

item.title: Field - xnm
item.description: Sysplex name as defined in ECVTSPLX Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74XNM
